title.native: 悪役令嬢転生おじさん
title.english: From Bureaucrat to Villainess: Dad's Been Reincarnated!

description: After a traffic accident, 52-year-old civil servant Kenzaburou Tondabayashi awakens to find he's become Grace Auvergne, a duke's daughter, and more importantly the villainess of an otome game. Not wanting to get in the way of the happy endings of the young characters around him, Grace sets out to play the role of the villain, but whether it's due to Kenzaburou's memories of being an affectionate parent getting in the way or not being able to remember those pesky foreign names properly, it ends up being a lot harder than it looks...
synonyms: The Middle-Aged Man that Reincarnated as a Villainess
Om-om yang Bereinkarnasi Menjadi Putri Jahat

tags.name: Villainess
tags.description: Centers around or prominently features a villainous noble lady.

tags.name: Seinen
tags.description: Target demographic is adult males.

tags.name: Video Games
tags.description: Centers around characters playing video games.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Gender Bending
tags.description: Prominently features a character who dresses and behaves in a way characteristic of another gender, or has been transformed into a person of another gender.

tags.name: Otaku Culture
tags.description: Centers around the culture of a fanatical fan-base.

tags.name: Female Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is female.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Elderly Protagonist
tags.description: The protagonist is either over 60 years of age, has an elderly appearance, or, in the case of non-humans, is considered elderly for their species.

tags.name: Mixed Gender Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several people, regardless of gender, who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Matchmaking
tags.description: Prominently features either a matchmaker or events with the intent of matchmaking with eventual marriage in sight.

tags.name: Age Regression
tags.description: Prominently features a character who was returned to a younger state.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Royal Affairs
tags.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Dragons
tags.description: Prominently features mythical reptiles which generally have wings and can breathe fire.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Nekomimi
tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.name: Maids
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a maid.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.

tags.name: Gods
tags.description: Prominently features a character of divine or religious nature.

node.description:
Male mangaka born in Saitama on May 14, 1970. His younger brother is [Ueyama Tetsuro](https://anilist.co/staff/115721/Tetsuro-Ueyama).

[Blog](http://mueyama.blog15.fc2.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ueyamamichiro) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=53823) | [Pawoo](https://pawoo.net/@ueyamamichiro)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/midorihatoneko) | [Twitter 2](https://twitter.com/i/user/286739197)

Originating from [Production I.G](https://anilist.co/studio/10/).

_Note: Not to be confused with the [older animator](https://anilist.co/staff/250761/) by the same name._

**[Website](http://iris-in.com/)**

**Birthplace:** Fukuoka Prefecture, Japan

**Irie Shingo** is a Japanese script/screenwriter and series composer.

**Date of Birth:** ?? ??, 1977
**Residency:** Tokyo, Japan

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/ryohirata0110)** | **[Blog (JP)](http://hirataryo.cocolog-nifty.com/blog/)**

**Ryou Hirata** is a Japanese animator and designer, who does prop, character and art design.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tanakarion)

Animator formerly affiliated with [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/Toei-Animation) from 2005 until 2023.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/YasufumiSoejima/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/soejima_yasufumi/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/ys19710313)

A director with past experience in computer graphics. Former CG animator and director at [Gonzo](https://anilist.co/studio/3/GONZO). He is currently affiliated with [David Production](https://anilist.co/studio/287/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/midorihatoneko) | [Twitter 2](https://twitter.com/i/user/286739197)

Originating from [Production I.G](https://anilist.co/studio/10/).

_Note: Not to be confused with the [older animator](https://anilist.co/staff/250761/) by the same name._

**[Website](http://iris-in.com/)**

**Birthplace:** Fukuoka Prefecture, Japan

**Irie Shingo** is a Japanese script/screenwriter and series composer.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/YasufumiSoejima/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/soejima_yasufumi/) | [Blog](https://ameblo.jp/ys19710313)

A director with past experience in computer graphics. Former CG animator and director at [Gonzo](https://anilist.co/studio/3/GONZO). He is currently affiliated with [David Production](https://anilist.co/studio/287/).
